title: Senior Payroll Officer
description: Responsible for processing fortnightly payroll for 150+ employees, managing superannuation contributions, and ensuring compliance with Fair Work Act requirements

title: Casual Customer Service Representative
description: Provides customer support on an as-needed basis, working variable hours including weekends and public holidays

title: Fixed-Term Project Coordinator
description: 12-month contract position to manage implementation of new HRIS system, reporting to IT Director

title: Part-Time HR Coordinator
description: Works 20 hours per week managing recruitment, onboarding, and employee records

title: Apprentice Electrician
description: 4-year electrical apprenticeship under supervision of licensed electrician
